projects.title: Mini Linux Shell
projects.description: Implemented Mini Linux Shell and simple File System in C. Executed commands like md/rd/ls/cd/stats on directories and create/remove/display commands on files.

projects.title: Page Rank in Parallel Processing
projects.description: Used Python frameworks such as MapReduce and Spark for large-scale computations. Explored Markov chains' connection with the PageRank algorithm and provided a comprehensive implementation with insights into its dynamic evolution.

projects.title: Fl-Ai-ppy Bird
projects.description: Developed an AI bot to play Flappy Bird using Q-learning. Built using FlapPY Bird as a base, incorporating reinforcement learning concepts of rewards and punishments.
